type.description:
Please enter the connection type we should use for your KNX connection. 
 AUTOMATIC - The integration takes care of the connectivity to your KNX Bus by performing a gateway scan. 
 TUNNELING - The integration will connect to your KNX bus via tunneling. 
 ROUTING - The integration will connect to your KNX bus via routing.
